alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of Fallon, Custer, western Carter and Powder River Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from 18 miles west of Terry to 22 miles southeast of Miles City to 30 miles northwest of Spotted Horse. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Westerly wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar and observation indicated. At 619pm a gust of 51 mph was reported at the Miles City airport. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Broadus, Ekalaka, Volborg, Biddle, Plevna, Ismay, Locate, Westmore, Boyes, Sonnette, Medicine Rocks State Park, Knowlton, Moorhead, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area, Willard, Olive, Webster and Twelve Mile Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
